module.name: Languages
module.description: Adds the ability to changes the language within a call flow and add language attribute to users.
module.changelog: *2.8.0.2* localization updates *2.8.0.1* #4353 *2.8.0.0* localizations, dbug statment removed *2.7.0.2* localizations *2.7.0.1* re #4004 *2.7.0.0* #4004 add language option to inbound routes *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.0.6* localization, Swedish *2.5.0.5* #3174 fix validation code *2.5.0.4* #3110, #3138 *2.5.0.3* #2530 typo _GLOBALS should be GLOBALS *2.5.0.2* fix depends to 2.5.0alpha1 *2.5.0.1* r6123 inject macro-user-callerid with required language setting (was hardcoded) *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.3* #2843 Russian Translation, removal of un-needed code *2.4.0.2* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0.1* #2578 use setlanguage to handle changes in Asterisk 1.6 *2.4.0* First release of module
